statements.select:
SELECT PR.ROUTE_NO, PR.SLOC_AREA, PR.ELOC_AREA, PLT1.LOC_TYPE_NAME AS SLOC_TYPE, PLT2.LOC_TYPE_NAME AS ELOC_TYPE, PR.DEFAULT_PRIORITY, CASE PR.IO_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'O' THEN '出库' WHEN 'M' THEN '移库' ELSE '异常' END IO_TYPE, PR.FMEM, CASE PR.TRANS_TYPE_NO WHEN '10' THEN '堆垛机' WHEN '20' THEN '输送线' WHEN '30' THEN 'AGV' WHEN '40' THEN 'RGV' WHEN '50' THEN 'EMS' ELSE '未知' END TRANS_TYPE_NO, CASE PR.USED_FLAG WHEN 1 THEN '启用' ELSE '未用' END USED_FLAG, CASE PR.TERMINAL_FLAG WHEN 1 THEN '末端路径' WHEN 0 THEN '节点路径' ELSE '异常' END TERMINAL_FLAG, PR.LIMIT_CAPACITY, PR.CURR_CAPACITY, PR.PALLET_TYPE FROM PSB_ROUTE PR JOIN PSB_LOC_TYPE PLT1 ON PR.SLOC_TYPE = PLT1.LOC_TYPE_NO JOIN PSB_LOC_TYPE PLT2 ON PR.ELOC_TYPE = PLT2.LOC_TYPE_NO
PR.ROUTE_NO LIKE '%'||#where.ROUTE_NO#||'%'
PR.SLOC_AREA LIKE '%'||#where.SLOC_AREA#||'%'
PR.ELOC_AREA LIKE '%'||#where.ELOC_AREA#||'%'
ORDER BY ROUTE_NO
